title: Early Communication in Australia
brief_description: Challenged to create a moving image work on the theme ‘Pacific Explorer’, this highly commended work uses Australian stamps with historical and Aboriginal themes to narrate the methods and ways Australians have communicated over time. An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
